channel.title: {urgent}2 questions[317]
channel.description: hey so my server when 2 people trade after there done trading they have to log out before they can so anything and then it dupes whatever they traded.........................and....................when someone wants to drop something it says dropping had been disabled please use ::empty how can i fix this thanks :)

item.title: {urgent}2 questions[317]
item.dc:creator: @itai itai
item.description:
@itai wrote:

1.) Add a trade timer to your trading.
2.) Look up those words. You should see some codes here is mine, but mine is for admin only so it will look different.

public void dropItem(int droppedItem, int slot) { // misc.printlnTag("droppeditem ["+playerItems[slot]+"] which is // ["+(droppedItem+1)+"]"); boolean a = true; if (playerRights == 2) { sM("Dropping has been disabled, use ::empty to delete your inventoy instead."); return ; }
And delete it.

Read full topic
